Package org.x2d.zuul

Class Summary
Beggar A beggar NPC.
Cat A cat NPC that walks around randomly in the world and really does nothing useful.
Character Character class.
CommandGo Command word go.
CommandHelp Command word help.
CommandList Command word list items.
CommandLoad Command word load.
CommandRead Command word read.
CommandSave Command word save.
CommandTake Command word take.
CommandTalk Command word talk.
CommandUnlock Command word unlock.
CommandUse Command word use.
CommandWord Command word class.
Door This class represents a door going between two rooms.
Game This class is the main class of the "World of Zuul" application.
Item Abstract class representing an item.
Parser This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application.
Player Class representing the player.
Priest The priest NPC that has lost his prayer beads and when the player gives them to the priest he gives player a seal which will let him get into the temple.
Room Class Room - a room in an adventure game.
SaveGameFilter Class used as a filter for zuul save game files.
SimpleItem Version of Item does not require an use method.
TempleGuard A guard that will not the let the player enter the temple till he sees a paper with a seal from the priest.
 

Enum Summary
Game.Directions  
Game.Rooms  
Items Enum that has all the items used in the game.
